channel.title: Projects on Caterina Urban
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Caterina Urban

item.title: FuncTion
item.description: The goal of the FuncTion project was the development of a static analyzer which automatically infers ranking functions and sufficient precondition for program termination (and other liveness properties) by means of abstract interpretation.

item.title: Libra
item.description: The goal of the Libra project is to develop new analyses and tools to reason about and certify fairness of decision-making software.

item.title: Lyra
item.description: The Lyra research project is a long-term research effort to enhance the understanding and reliabilty of data science software. It aims ad developing new practical and accessible analyses and tools to reason about and provide rigorous guarantees of the behavior of data analytics, big data, machine learning, and deep learning applications.
